content.rendered:
To keep you up to date with our updates, check out Atomic’s report for February! New desktop and mobile releases, AMA sessions, AWC pump, our support team’s stats and many more!

What is done: 

  1. New Desktop Release
  2. New Mobile Release
  3. AWC Token
  4. Review at the David Pakman Show
  5. AMA Sessions
  6. Support Work in February

Desktop Release (2.14.0)

The new desktop version 2.14.0 has these features:

  • New asset: Hedera Hashgraph (HBAR).
  • Buy DASH and stable coins: DAI, PAX, BUSD, with a bank card in 18 fiat currencies.
  • Available TRX voices can be staked.
  • BTT, WINk airdrop rewards calculation is now based on a total balance.

You can download Atomic here.

Atomic Mobile Release

What’s new in the 0.56.0 Android and iOS versions:

  • Buy crypto with AUD, CAD, GBP, RUB, JPN, and 13 more fiat currencies!
  • Dash and stable coins: DAI, PAX, BUSD can be purchased with a bank card.
  • Stake available TRX voices.
  • Bug fixes for sending ADA, ONT/ONG, ARK.

Get the new Atomic Mobile for iOS or Android here.

Atomic at the David Packman Show

In February, Atomic wallet was reviewed by David Pakman at his multi-platform politics and news talk show. Take a look here! 

Atomic Wallet Token (AWC)

AWC is a native currency with a total supply of 100,000,000. Since the launch, its value has grown by 500%! The current circulating supply of 10,000,000 gives benefits to 40,000+ holders, offering affiliate and bounty rewards, a unique cash back program, voting for the new assets listing, and many other use cases are to come. Read more here. 

AMAs in February

Atomic Wallet hosted AMA session with Origin Protocol, the blockchain platform for building decentralized marketplaces, in our Telegram chat. Also, Atomic’s team was present at the session by Ark’s community this month. You’re welcome to read our digests:

Origin Protocol

Atomic hosted by Ark 

Support Work in February

In February our support team reacted to 3894 issues in 25 minutes on average. We’re constantly getting reviews on the service, and happily improving it day by day. In case of any problem, reach us by email or live chat widget on our website. Atomic support service works for you 24/7. 

We’re happy to work on Atomic Wallet for you! Be always aware of our news and updates with Twitter, Telegram, Facebook, and Reddit.

excerpt.rendered: To keep you up to date with our updates, check out Atomic’s report for February! New desktop and mobile releases, AMA sessions, AWC pump, our support team’s stats and many more!
